attributes.title: Great app!
attributes.review: Allows users to get more involved than any other presidential campaign ever. Great idea for an app and runs on my iphone 6 smoothly

attributes.title: Go President Trump!!!
attributes.review: I love this app and it has been fantastic to get the truth right from our President! I'm very grateful for him and all the people on here. America the beautiful and America first!

attributes.title: This app didn't cost billions and it works
attributes.review: I can't wait to see what Trump's team can do with the health care website.

attributes.title: App is great for Deplorables!
attributes.review: I am a proud Deplorable and as such this app is perfect for keeping up with the candidate who is fighting for all Americans regardless of gender, color, creed, orientation, and religion. If you love America you'll love this app and more importantly Donald J. Trump! MAGA!!

attributes.title: Great man
attributes.review:
Donald J Trump is the right man at the right time!
This app is an incredible link to his candidacy. He shall win and we will win our country back from the insanity of liberalism and political correctness and racism!

attributes.title: Love This!
attributes.review:
Everything about this app is great. I assume it's the genius of the data queen, Kelly Anne Conway. 
**One issue only...I cannot upload a profile photo? Any tips?

attributes.title: IF YOU LOVE YOUR COUNTRY YOU'LL GET THIS APP
attributes.review: Like he is good at everything, Mr. Trump is good at making an app. It's interactive and fun to use and its great competing for points with people in your state. Were gonna win big in November boys. MAGA.

attributes.title: Great, Useful App but Add Sticker Functionality!
attributes.review: Love the app but would be fantastic if users could use "Trump" stickers in IOS messages! Please add functionality!

attributes.title: MAGA!
attributes.review: This app is YUGE in spreading the work to make Anerica great again!  Spread the word to defeat the corrupt career criminals that are our politicians. No more Clintons, no more Obamas. No more Warren, Pelosi, Reid..... Lets re boot and do what our Founding Fathers dreamed of for our great Nation!

attributes.title: Maga
attributes.review: America must come first before we start dealing with other countries. We need to make sure we have strong borders
